name: Hats 1 Online Trivia | Beauty Accessories & Fashion | 5 Questions

questions.text: One purpose of a hat is to indicate status?
questions.explanation:
True.

	A hat is also used as an ornament and worn for protection.

questions.text: Which of the following is not a type of hat?
questions.explanation:
Izod.

	Bowlers or derbys were mostly for city wear. Stovepipes were considered a gentleman's hat.

questions.text: What is another name for a three cornered hat?
questions.explanation:
Tricorne.

	The three cornered hat was developed from the plumed hat by turning up the brim at the front and both sides.

questions.text: A hat worn by the military is sometimes called a cover?
questions.explanation:
True.

	In the military you will hear the phrase 'remove your cover'.

questions.text: What kind of hat was made famous by JFK's wife?
questions.explanation:
Pillbox.

	In history president's wives were known to set fashion trends.
